articles.title: "Will Pardon Trump If...": Indian-American Presidential Hopeful Vivek Ramaswamy - NDTV
articles.description: Republican presidential aspirant Vivek Ramaswamy said on Sunday that while he expects to become the party's nominee for the November 2024 US elections, will vote for Donald Trump if the former president secures the nomination.
articles.content:
Vivek Ramaswamy is notably the sole Republican presidential hopeful to openly endorse Trump

articles.title: A 'fevered hallucination': Latin America meets Vivek Ramaswamy - POLITICO
articles.description: The Republican candidate wants to prioritize the Western Hemisphere, but in ways that worry its leaders.
